info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:31AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Goliad and north central Bee Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 631 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tulsita, or 13 miles south of Kenedy, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pettus, Tulsita, Tuleta and Charco. This includes US Highway 181 between mile markers 572 and 580. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
